author: Special Correspondent
text:
The youth should equip themselves to build a powerful, modern and vibrant India, Raman, Executive Director of Salem Steel Plant, said here on Tuesday.

He hoisted the National Flag at the Republic Day celebrations held at the Plant and took the salute at a parade presented by the contingent of Central Industrial Security Force, township security personnel, and students of Sri Vidya Mandir Matriculation Higher Secondary School.

Mr. Raman highlighted the progress made by the country in the past seven decades. The Steel Authority of India Limited had played a significant role in the overall development of the nation. He commended the performance of Salem Steel Plant during the past year and urged the employees to continue to give their best for increasing production and productivity.

The Executive Director also thanked the State Government and the district administration for the support extended to the SSP. Mr. Raman gave away Jawahar Award for distinguished service to executives. Prizes were distributed to the CISF for good job done and cash awards for best turn out.
title: A message for the youth
